title: Epic Legendary Intense Massive Heroic Vengeful Dramatic Music Mix - 1 Hour Long
description: All these tracks have been mixed and edited together in order to provide an epic, legendary and unforgettable journey into a realm of your own mind. If you'd like to be kept up-to-date with our chosen path, then please Like the Official Versus Music Fan Page and make sure to follow on Soundcloud: http://www.facebook.com/VersusMusicOf... https://soundcloud.com/versusofficial DOWNLOAD LINK: https://soundcloud.com/versusofficial... Keep tuned for more of this kind of music and mixes at: https://www.facebook.com/VersusMusicO... https://soundcloud.com/versusofficial http://extnctofficial.bandcamp.com http://www.youtube.com/user/extnction http://www.youtube.com/user/VersusMus...
